name: Pukachi Online
description:
You're a die-hard fan of the famous Animal Connect game series? You're in love with the cute, addictive, suitable-for-all-ages minigame but also looking for more 'action'? Wait no more, Pukachi Online Is Here For The Rescue!
Engage in thrilling online matches with players around the world, challenge your frienemy to compete in exciting Pukachi maps and have your name appeared in our weekly leaderboard. Enjoy the sweet sense of victory when racing with time to conquer each level in offline mode, but don't forget to show off your score through Facebook connecting feature! Well, buddies, the door of excitement is waiting for you to open!!

FEATURES
● Compete in online matches with players worldwide
● Have your own training through more than 40 maps, updated regularly
● Connect to Facebook to share your score with friends
● Buy helping items in store to smoothen your way to victory
PLEASE NOTE! Pukachi Online is an in-app purchase game, meaning it's free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
